game.name: PlateUp!
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 음식을 조리해서 내놓고, 레스토랑을 디자인하고 장식하며, 이 알고리즘 기반 생성 장소에서 새로운 잠금 해제 아이템, 능력, 요리로 음식 왕국을 넓혀가세요. 영구적인 로그라이트 진행의 클래식 쿠킹 액션. 친구를 고용하거나 모두 직접 하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cook and serve your dishes, design and decorate your restaurants, and expand your culinary kingdom with new unlocks, abilities and dishes in procedurally-generated locations. Classic cooking action with permanent roguelite progression. Hire your friends - or do it all yourself!

reviewHighlights.text: A roguelite game with a simple concept of making and serving food, but with many twists and challenges that greatly increase replayability. With a cou...
WHY IS COOKING SO STRESSFUL ITS SUPPOSED TO BE RELAXING HELPPPPPP!!!! 6/10 solo 11/10 with more than 2 people
